item.title: Can SIP Trunking Supplant ISDN PRI?
item.description:
Businesses that require multiple phone lines can benefit from digital trunks. While previously only large companies with numerous lines saw advantages with digital trunks, advancements in technology now make them a viable option for businesses with just a few lines and internet access. What exactly constitutes a telephone trunk? Essentially, it is a collection of phone lines bundled together. Unlike individual analog lines, which consist of a twisted pair of copper wires, a trunk combines multiple lines...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/can-sip-trunking-supplant-isdn-pri/
